taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [For Dominico Cirillo, 1739–1799, Italian physician and professor of natural history, University of Naples]

bio:treatment.discussion: Species 1: e, sc United States, s Mexico, West Indies, Central America, n South America.

Several species or varieties of Cyrilla have been distinguished on the basis of local variation in leaf and inflorescence size; most recent floristic treatments follow J. L. Thomas (1960) and recognize a single variable species.

references.reference: Dute, R. R. et al. 2004. Floral anatomy and pollination biology of Cyrilla racemiflora (Cyrillaceae). SouthE. Naturalist 3: 309–326.
